Rattlesnakes are the only agent with a dynamic behavioral profile. The kangaroo rats can only be active or inactive at certain times if the day. 

Rattlesnakes have 5 behaviors they can employ. Bruminating, prey searching, and at certain times of the day; Resting are deterministic behaviors that the snake has to do. During active times of the day; snakes can choose between 3 behaviors of resting, thermoregulating, and foraging.

The base function to employ this is the step function in the ectotherm behavior class
